ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I have noticed, we DO memorize our songs faster as we level.  When you first got Hymn remember how long it took to mem it.  At level 21 I can mem
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I have noticed, we DO memorize our songs faster as we level. When
you first got Hymn remember how long it took to mem it. At level 21 I can
mem Hymn really fast, its just the level 21 song that takes forever to mem.

Faras Tar'Linedhel

> -----Original Message-----
> From: silky@... [mailto:silky@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:31 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Limit on song memorization
>
>
> From: silky@...
>
>
> Well, for mages (yes I have an enchanter too - funny how they
> seem to fill
> the same slot in magic circles as we bards do) although I may
> have trouble
> deciding - it is INFINITELY easier to memorize spells, than songs.
>
> Since we never get meditiate - our songs mem as slowly as the
> day we get
> them - THAT is a problem.
>
> Besides the ONE song we have that DOES use manna, any reason
> they can't
> make our songs faster as we progress in skill?
>
>
>
